attributes.action: Pay all keyworkers a £500 tax free bonus.
attributes.additional_details: This should be done as a massive thank you to all the hard workers during the covid 19 crisis. The hardworking minimum wage workers going in everyday putting their health at risk to keep the country moving yet getting no rewards for it.
attributes.background: After all the hard work the keyworkers have been putting in to keeping the country moving, it would be nice for the government to recognise their hard work by giving each of them a £500 tax free bonus.
